title: Fish Consumption Reduces Post-Partum Depression
author: PipeTabor
cleaned_text: Just another reason to include fish in your diet! AANP - Eating More Fish Could Reduce Postpartum Depression - (Monday, November 9, 2012) -According to a new scientific review, low dietary levels of omega-3 fatty acids may be behind postpartum depression.
